sqlMap.select:
$pageSQLA$ select t.* from EP_PROCESS t
t.ss_sisdel='0'
and t.ss_nId =#searchA#
order by t.ss_nId $pageSQLB$
select count(1) from EP_PROCESS t where t.ss_sisdel = '0'

select SS_NID, EP_SNO, BG_SNO, SS_NNO, SS_SPURTYPE, SS_SNAME, SS_NWORK, SS_SPAGE, SS_SSTATE, SS_SMAN, SS_TDATE, SS_TSTART, SS_TEND, SS_STOMAIL, SS_SSENDMAIL, SS_SSENDPWD, SS_STITLE, SS_SCONTENT, SS_SFILEURL, SS_STEMPLETE, SS_SREMARK, SS_SURL1, SS_SURL2, SS_SURL3, SS_SURL4, SS_SURL5, SS_SISDEL, SS_SISVALID, SS_SREPLYBY, SS_SREPLYDATE, SS_SALTERBY, SS_SALTERDATE, SS_SDEF1, SS_SDEF2, SS_SDEF3, SS_SDEF4, SS_SDEF5, SS_SDEF6, SS_SDEF7, SS_SDEF8, SS_SDEF9, SS_SDEF10, SS_SDEF11, SS_SDEF12, SS_SDEF13, SS_SDEF14, SS_SDEF15, SS_SDEF16, SS_SDEF17, SS_SDEF18, SS_SDEF19, SS_SDEF20, SS_NDEF1, SS_NDEF2, SS_NDEF3, SS_NDEF4, SS_NDEF5, SS_TDEF1, SS_TDEF2, SS_TDEF3, SS_TDEF4, SS_TDEF5 from CG.EP_PROCESS where SS_NID = #SS_NID:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
select nvl(max(SS_NID),0)+1 from EP_PROCESS
